toolDisplayName: Creating Energy in Body and Mind

toolData.sleepNotDoWell: Go to bed at different times each night
toolData.sleepRoutine: 1. Alarm at 10:30 2. Start winding down 3. In bed by 11pm
toolData.sleepReward: Better mood and productivity next day
toolData.foodRoutine: 1. Mix oats and milk 2. Add fruit 3. Put in fridge
toolData.foodAccountabilityPartner: Track in food journal, share weekly
toolData.movementRoutine: 1. Pour coffee 2. Stretch for 15 min 3. Then drink coffee
toolData.brainRoutine: 1. Review week ahead 2. Group similar tasks 3. Block calendar
toolData.brainReward: Get more done in less time
toolData.mentalCanControl: My priorities, my boundaries, my energy management
toolData.mentalCannotControl: Company decisions, team dynamics, external events
toolData.doLess2: Worrying about things I can't control
toolData.eventDescription: Got overwhelmed with too many deadlines at once
toolData.gapAnalysis: Felt stressed, couldn't focus, wanted to quit
toolData.idealResponse: Break tasks into smaller pieces, ask for help, prioritize ruthlessly
toolData.futurePlan: When overwhelmed: pause, list everything, pick top 3 only, delegate rest
